entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
